product_name: IT CosmeticsBye Bye Pores Pressed Pore Minimizing Setting Powder
summary: SummaryIT Cosmetics Bye Bye Pores Pressed Translucent Setting Powder minimizes the look of pores for smoother, younger-looking skin with a natural matte finish.
details: DetailsBenefitsExperience your most skin-loving, airbrushed look with Bye Bye Pores Pressed Translucent Setting PowderFeaturing Bye Bye Pores Optical Blurring Technology, it's designed to blur the appearance of pores and imperfections while delivering a smooth, natural matte finish for younger-looking skinThis pressed powder is perfect to wear on bare skin or over makeup!Plus, it comes in three shades formulated with skin-loving silk, hydrolyzed collagen and antioxidantsThe finishing powder can be applied throughout the day for on-the-go touch-ups and doubles as a blotting powder too!Developed with plastic surgeons' insights and dermatologists' ingredient and skincare expertise, IT Cosmetics creates problem-solving, skin-loving formulas that give you visible results, experience the IT Beauty difference!Best-selling, award-winning Bye Bye Pores Powder formula-in a perfectly portable compactBlurs the appearance of pores while delivering a smooth, natural matte finish for youthful-looking skinComes in three shades with skin-loving silk, hydrolyzed collagen and antioxidants!Key IngredientsSilk: Known to be a moisturizing natural protein fiber that works to smooth, soften and condition skinHydrolyzed Collagen: Supports elasticity for a youthfully smooth appearanceAntioxidants: Help reduce the appearance of the visible signs of skin damage and agingItem 2587041How To UseSweep a small amount of Bye Bye Pores Pressed Translucent Setting Powder onto skin using Heavenly Luxe Wand Ball Powder Brush #8 for a flawless makeup look with a skin-perfecting finish.Can be worn over makeup or on bare skin to optically blur the appearance of pores.IngredientsSynthetic Fluorphlogopite, Silica Zinc Stearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isostearyl Neopentanoate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Niacinamide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Serica Powder / Silk Powder / Poudre De Soie, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Jojoba Esters, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Glycerin, Aqua / Water / Eau, Butylene Glycol, Hydrolyzed Collagen,Tocopherol, Carbomer, Sodium Lactate, Polysorbate 20, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7. May Contain: Mica, CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 / Iron Oxides CI 77891 / Titanium Dioxide CI 77007 / Ultramarines.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Sweep a small amount of Bye Bye Pores Pressed Translucent Setting Powder onto skin using Heavenly Luxe Wand Ball Powder Brush #8 for a flawless makeup look with a skin-perfecting finish.Can be worn over makeup or on bare skin to optically blur the appearance of pores.
ingredients: Serica Powder / Silk Powder / Poudre De Soie

reviews.headline: translucent
reviews.comments: this works really well for me. I use on my t zone. My eyelids are oily and can mess up my mascara so I dab this on my eyelids to control the oil there as well. works great. I swear by  IT Cosmetics.

reviews.headline: I'll buy again and again
reviews.comments: I have bought this again and again.  I use it as a setting powderr.  It does everything you'd hope it would.  I apply after using their bronzer.  It sets everything, never have to reapply and hides my pores.

reviews.headline: Bye Bye Pores... Seriously where did they go???
reviews.comments: When paired with the CC cream it is the perfect combination!!!! Doesn't settle in fine line or wrinkles and make pores nearly invisible. You won't be disappointed.

reviews.headline: Didn't work for me
reviews.comments: It didnt set my make up at all. Didnt look set and didnt last longer.

reviews.headline: The best!
reviews.comments: Love it so much!!!!

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: The best finishing translucent powder that i have ever used!

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: The best finishing translucent powder that i have ever used!

reviews.headline: Not long lasting/a little chalky
reviews.comments: It does give a poreless look but after an hour it starts breaking up and doesnt keep makeup set/oil away.

reviews.headline: Not long lasting/a little chalky
reviews.comments: It does give a poreless look but after an hour it starts breaking up and doesnt keep makeup set/oil away.

reviews.headline: Deceiving amount and chalky
reviews.comments: I am very disappointed in this powder and I will be returning.  Rather than minimizing my pores, it sits on top of my foundation, looking dry and chalky.  It also is an insanely small amount for the packaging and price.  I will be returning.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Great product

reviews.headline: Just what my aging dry yet shiny skin needed!
reviews.comments: I have tried all the powders. Name an luxury brand acclaimed by the influencers, and I have it.  But this one blew them all out of the water.  I have dry, aging skin that is just starting to show wrinkles but which gets shiney by the end of the day. This one blurred by pores, didn't show my wrinkles, blotted the shine ALL day and yet didn't make my face overly dry.  The puff/sponge was an extra that I didn't know I needed until I realized how amazingly handy it was for carrying it around for quick touchups. Got this during an Ulta beauty sale but I would pay twice the full price.  My new Holy Grail powder.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: I am sure it is a fine product, but I would like something with more color. This product is clear at best, and almost white at worst.

reviews.headline: AWFUL BREAKOUTS
reviews.comments: I've never had a product break me out like this one. I only use this product occasionally and even after one use after almost a week i had horrible breakouts and I do not usually have ance either. I don't normally break out, so after using this product it was quite upsetting to see.

reviews.headline: Shows everything
reviews.comments: I used to love this product but they must have changed the formula. It shows every line on my face and doesnt blend at all.

reviews.headline: The besr
reviews.comments: Goes on flawless and looks just wonderful

reviews.headline: Do not buy this
reviews.comments: I will say this does help remove the appearance of pores but WOW it creased so badly and just made the rest of my makeup cake up even on the brush & beauty blender it was all caked up on there and I had to redo my whole face

reviews.headline: Great Pressed Powder
reviews.comments: I have two of these now, one stays with me in my car and one at home. Great coverage. Feels non caky too. Which is something I really love about the iT Products in general.

reviews.headline: Love it!!
reviews.comments: This my first time trying a pressed powder over a loose powder, and i LOVE this one! Definitely will be purchasing again

reviews.headline: It's a Yes!
reviews.comments: I was skeptical at first... but... this is a win! It truly does make your face look airbrushed, and truly does have a blurring/smoothing effect. Pairing it with a slightly dewy setting spray will ensure it blends and isn't chalky.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I needed to find a new finishing powder because the one I had been using wasn't all that great and was on it's way out. I have large pores thanks to genetics and oily skin, which is worsened around my large pore area, my nose and T zone in general. 

So I got this seeing as it had favorable reviews and see how it would work for me and honestly, I was in love with this powder the first day I tried it. It goes on like a dream and is pleasantly smooth and silky. It coupled with my primer minimized my pores very well and after testing it for three days I am completely sold. It's held up to me working near ovens at work and me sweating as I walk out in the blistering sun. No caking or any signs of it failing. It's nice to have a finishing powder that doesn't cake because of my oils.

I don't think I can recommend this enough to try.
faceoff_positive.headline: I'm in love

faceoff_negative.comments: While I absolutely love this pressed powder, I hate how big the packaging is for how little product you actually get. I would much prefer a very thin packaging so that it takes up less space in my makeup, or a deeper pan so that it doesn't break as easily.
faceoff_negative.headline: Great product. Horrible packaging.
